languages.text: "Видите ли, Лорд-капитан... диверсант, определенно, представитель техножречества. Он проник на борт тайно и прошел сквозь все системы безопасности, как нож сквозь масло. Его способности в общении с машинными духами, а также боевая мощь имплантов — совершенно выдающиеся... и все же блюстители смогли его схватить".

"The thing is, Lord Captain... The saboteur is most definitely a Tech-Priest. He found his way aboard the ship and penetrated all our security systems with staggering ease. Both his ability to communicate with machine spirits and the combat potential of his augmentations are extraordinary... Nevertheless, the enforcers managed to capture him."
languages.original_text: "Видите ли, Лорд-капитан... диверсант, определенно, представитель техножречества. Он проник на борт тайно и прошел сквозь все системы безопасности, как нож сквозь масло. Его способности в общении с машинными духами, а также боевая мощь имплантов — совершенно выдающиеся... и все же блюстители смогли его схватить".

traits.locale_text: "The thing is, Lord Captain... The saboteur is definitely one of the Tech-Priests. He intruded the ship in secret and passed through all the security systems like a knife through butter. His ability of communication with machine spirits and the combat potential of augmentations are totally extraordinary... Nevertheless, guardians managed to capture him."

"The thing is, Lord Captain... The saboteur is definitely one of the Tech-Priests. He intruded the ship in secret and passed through all the security systems like a knife through butter. His ability of communication with machine spirits and the combat potential of augmentations are totally extraordinary... Nevertheless, guardians managed to capture him."

"The thing is, Lord Captain... The saboteur is certainly one of the Tech-Priests. He intruded into the ship and penetrated all our security systems like a hot knife through butter. His ability to communicate with machine spirits and the combat potential of his augmentations are extremely extraordinary... Nevertheless, the guardians managed to capture him."

"The thing is, Lord Captain... The saboteur is certainly one of the Tech-Priests. He intruded into the ship and penetrated all our security systems like a hot knife through butter. His ability to communicate with machine spirits and the combat potential of his augmentations are extremely extraordinary... Nevertheless, the guardians managed to capture him."

"The thing is, Lord Captain... The saboteur is most definitely a Tech-Priest. He found his way aboard the ship and penetrated all our security systems with staggering ease. Both his ability to communicate with machine spirits and the combat potential of his augmentations are extraordinary... Nevertheless, the enforcers managed to capture him."

languages.text: “是这样的，舰长大人……这个破坏者肯定是位技术神甫。他闯入了我们的飞船，毫不费力地破解了我们所有的安全系统。他非常擅长与机魂交流，战斗潜力也极其出色……但即便如此，船上的执法者还是抓住了他。”
languages.original_text: "The thing is, Lord Captain... The saboteur is most definitely a Tech-Priest. He found his way aboard the ship and penetrated all our security systems with staggering ease. Both his ability to communicate with machine spirits and the combat potential of his augmentations are extraordinary... Nevertheless, the enforcers managed to capture him."

traits.locale_text: “是这样的，舰长大人……这个破坏者肯定是位技术神甫。他闯入了我们的飞船，毫不费力地破解了我们所有的安全系统。他非常擅长与机魂交流，战斗潜力也极其出色……但即便如此，船上的执法者还是抓住了他。”

languages.text: « Eh bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Le saboteur est sans l'ombre d'un doute un technoprêtre. Il a réussi à s'orienter dans le dédale du vaisseau et à contourner tous nos systèmes de sécurité avec une aisance déconcertante. Sa capacité à communiquer avec les esprits de la machine et le potentiel offensif de ses augmentations sont extraordinaires... Néanmoins, les prévôts sont parvenus à le capturer. »
languages.original_text: "The thing is, Lord Captain... The saboteur is most definitely a Tech-Priest. He found his way aboard the ship and penetrated all our security systems with staggering ease. Both his ability to communicate with machine spirits and the combat potential of his augmentations are extraordinary... Nevertheless, the enforcers managed to capture him."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Le saboteur est sans l'ombre d'un doute un technoprêtre. Il a réussi à s'orienter dans le dédale du vaisseau et à contourner tous nos systèmes de sécurité avec une aisance déconcertante. Sa capacité à communiquer avec les esprits de la machine et le potentiel offensif de ses augmentations sont extraordinaires... Néanmoins, les prévôts sont parvenus à le capturer. »

languages.text: "Es ist so, Lord Captain ... Der Saboteur ist ohne jede Frage ein Techpriester. Er gelangte irgendwie an Bord und überwand dann vollkommen mühelos unsere Sicherheitssysteme. Seine Fähigkeit, mit Maschinengeistern zu kommunizieren, und das Kampfpotenzial seiner Augmentationen sind außergewöhnlich ... Dennoch schafften es die Enforcers, ihn zu schnappen."
languages.original_text: "The thing is, Lord Captain... The saboteur is most definitely a Tech-Priest. He found his way aboard the ship and penetrated all our security systems with staggering ease. Both his ability to communicate with machine spirits and the combat potential of his augmentations are extraordinary... Nevertheless, the enforcers managed to capture him."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist so, Lord Captain ... Der Saboteur ist ohne jede Frage ein Techpriester. Er gelangte irgendwie an Bord und überwand dann vollkommen mühelos unsere Sicherheitssysteme. Seine Fähigkeit, mit Maschinengeistern zu kommunizieren, und das Kampfpotenzial seiner Augmentationen sind außergewöhnlich ... Dennoch schafften es die Enforcers, ihn zu schnappen."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, el caso es que... el saboteador es, sin duda alguna, un tecnosacerdote. Logró entrar en la nave, superando todos nuestros sistemas de seguridad con una facilidad pasmosa. Tanto su capacidad para comunicarse con los espíritus máquina como el potencial de combate de sus aumentos se salen completamente de la norma... Aun así, el personal de seguridad ha logrado capturarlo».
languages.original_text: "The thing is, Lord Captain... The saboteur is most definitely a Tech-Priest. He found his way aboard the ship and penetrated all our security systems with staggering ease. Both his ability to communicate with machine spirits and the combat potential of his augmentations are extraordinary... Nevertheless, the enforcers managed to capture him."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, el caso es que... el saboteador es, sin duda alguna, un tecnosacerdote. Logró entrar en la nave, superando todos nuestros sistemas de seguridad con una facilidad pasmosa. Tanto su capacidad para comunicarse con los espíritus máquina como el potencial de combate de sus aumentos se salen completamente de la norma... Aun así, el personal de seguridad ha logrado capturarlo».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、実は……妨害工作員は、間違いなく技術司祭です。彼は船内に侵入し、驚くほど容易く我々のセキュリティシステムを突破しました。機械精霊との交信能力、そして義体拡張による戦闘力…いずれも並外れております…それでもなお、エンフォーサーが彼の拘束に成功しました」
languages.original_text: "The thing is, Lord Captain... The saboteur is most definitely a Tech-Priest. He found his way aboard the ship and penetrated all our security systems with staggering ease. Both his ability to communicate with machine spirits and the combat potential of his augmentations are extraordinary... Nevertheless, the enforcers managed to capture him."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、実は……妨害工作員は、間違いなく技術司祭です。彼は船内に侵入し、驚くほど容易く我々のセキュリティシステムを突破しました。機械精霊との交信能力、そして義体拡張による戦闘力…いずれも並外れております…それでもなお、エンフォーサーが彼の拘束に成功しました」

languages.text: "Şöyle ki Lord Kaptan... Sabotajcı bir Tekno Rahip, burası kesin. Gemiye çıkıp güvenlik sistemlerimizi şaşırtıcı bir rahatlıkla aşmayı başarmış. Makine ruhlarıyla iletişim kurabilmesi ve ogmentasyonlarının kuvveti sahiden olağanüstü... Buna rağmen infazcılarımıza yakalandı."
languages.original_text: "The thing is, Lord Captain... The saboteur is most definitely a Tech-Priest. He found his way aboard the ship and penetrated all our security systems with staggering ease. Both his ability to communicate with machine spirits and the combat potential of his augmentations are extraordinary... Nevertheless, the enforcers managed to capture him."
